title: Can Any AIML 4th Years give any info on these electives and their course work.

comments.body:
Bjd electives will generally be a little harder. And it'll have a big project+ 2 kaggle competitions

The electives taken by the guy called doreswamy are the easiest. He gives a question bank which is slightly bigger than the paper. And contains the paper. Average isa marks are like 38 or so.

Choose AI  for smart manufacturing and supply chain optimisation.
If u Gpa is low or u wanna get an easy S grade.

Courses like Social computing and advanced data analytics are a bit time consuming and has more volume. But extremely useful if u are interested in getting papers or good Aiml projects. Again take it only if u r interested.
